authorblurb.para: John Ferguson Smart is a well-known international consultant, trainer, author, and speaker in open source and agile Java development and testing practices. He specializes in helping development teams improve their game with techniques such as Test-Driven Development (including BDD and ATDD), Automated Acceptance Tests, Continuous Integration, Build Automation, and Clean Coding practices. He provides training and mentoring in open source technologies, SDLC tools, and agile development processes.
John is the director of Wakaleo Consulting, a company that provides consulting, training, and mentoring services in open source and agile Java development practices.
